sentences.en: A herd of horses is what the herdsman wants to have.
sentences.cn: 这个牧人想拥有的是一群马。

sentences.en: A HERDSMAN tending his flock in a forest lost Bull - calf from the fold.
sentences.cn: 牧人在树林中放牛,不幸丢失了一头离群的小牛犊.

sentences.en: At the approach of the evening the herdsman come to feed his cattle.
sentences.cn: 黄昏来临时,牧人来喂他的牲口.

sentences.en: But I hear he is in fact the son of a herdsman.
sentences.cn: 不过据臣妾所知,他只是个牧马人的儿子.

sentences.en: Herdsman must help with what this will protect this belongings, abb!
sentences.cn: 牧民不得不用此来保护自己的救命财产—羊毛!

sentences.en: I am an ordinary herdsman and I'm 41 years old.
sentences.cn: 我是一名普通的牧民,今年41岁,四口之家.

sentences.en: It became a bestseller in Iraq, and was even adapted into a musical, despite one alarming and improbable scene in which a female bear "copulates" with a herdsman.
sentences.cn: 它在伊拉克成了畅销书，甚至被改编成了音乐剧，尽管其中有一幕令人惊恐且匪夷所思——其中有一个牧人和一头母熊的人兽交。
肥沃的草地吸引了牧人.

sentences.en: Preliminary already show project beneficial result, herdsman resists the ability of natural disaster is strengthened somewhat.
sentences.cn: 已初步显示出工程建设效益, 牧民抗御自然灾难的能力有所加强.

sentences.en: The development nationality handicraft industry is increases herdsman's employment opportunity and an income good way.
sentences.cn: 发展民族手工业是增加牧民的就业机会和收入的好办法.

sentences.en: The girls sing, the men jump, herdsman's life and forth in the scenery between.
sentences.cn: 姑娘们唱起来, 汉子们跳起来, 牧人的生活在山水间穿梭.

sentences.en: The herdsman drew up his horse at the top of the cliff.
sentences.cn: 那牧民在悬顶把马勒住.

sentences.en: The herdsman drove afield battening his flocks with the fresh dews of night.
sentences.cn: 牧人把羊群赶到野外,用夜晚的新鲜露水催肥.

sentences.en: The herdsman looks after a herd of animals.
The west side of every wood and rising ground gleamed like a boundary of Elysium, the sun on our backs seemed like a gentle herdsman driving us home at evening.
sentences.cn: 每处林木的西边和凸起的地面流光溢彩，宛如乐园的边际，夕阳在背好似和蔼的牧人晚间赶车送我们回家。

sentences.en: The young herdsman briskly mounted a horse that was inclined to act up with an unaccustomed rider.
sentences.cn: 年轻牧民轻快地跃上一匹惯于对生人使性子的马.

sentences.en: You don't need a humanistic education in order to become a herdsman .
sentences.cn: 要成为一个牧人，你不需要接受人文主义的教育。

sentences.en: You don't need a humanistic education in order to become a herdsman.
sentences.cn: 要成为一个牧人，你不需要接受人文主义的教育。

trans.tran_en: a man who looks after a herd of animals
